title: Why I can't launch on lol when it works perfectly fine
body: I had original factory sets my computer, because my computer was a mess. I download lol again and it works fine, but now i only can keep on pressing launch and nothing happened. Can someone help me?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try running the game as administrator using the lol.launcher.admin.exe file located in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends, let me know if this helps.

thanks, it seems it works, but just redownload the whole game again.
:)

and also sorry that i forgot the comment i had and take 9 days to reply
:/
